title: Black Friday Apple deal drops the 2021 iPad Pro to $999 - the lowest price ever
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score a $100 Black Friday discount on Apple's powerful iPad Pro
article: Black Friday Apple deals are some of the hottest bargains you can find, and we just spotted an impressive discount on the 2021 iPad Pro. Amazon has the 12.9-inch Apple iPad Pro on sale for $999 (was $1,099). That's a $100 discount and the lowest price we've found for the powerful tablet. Due to stock issues, Black Friday iPad deals have been difficult to find lately, but today's offer is currently in stock and ready to ship for both the Silver and Space Gray colors. We don't know how long Amazon will have the iPad Pro on sale, so we'd snag this epic Black Friday deal or look forward to upcoming offers during the Cyber Monday deals event.

Apple's 2021 iPad Pro features a 12.9-inch Liquid Retina display, an ultra-wide front-facing camera, and an impressive speaker system. Perfect for students, the lightweight iPad Pro delivers more power than most laptops by offering Apple's M1 chipset and 128GB of storage. You're also getting Face ID for secure authentication, Apple Pay, and an all-day battery life. If you're looking for more Black Friday iPad deals, we've listed more of today's best offers below.
You can also see our guide to the best Black Friday Apple deals and see more early offers with our Amazon Black Friday deals roundup.
